Translations.Text: khsrt yada 'abi lahab wshqy b'iydhayh rasul allah mhmda salaa allah ealayh wslm, waqad tuhaqiq khsran 'abi lhb
ma aghna eanh maluh wwldh, falan yarudda eanh shyyana min eadhab allah 'iidha nazal bh
sydkhl narana mtajjt, hu wamra'atuh alty kanat tahmil alshwk, fttrhh fi tariq alnabiu salaa allah ealayh wslm; ladhyath
